original: B)...start an office pool where you compete to see who can humiliate her the most - first co-worker that gets her to cry wins?
translated: B)...在办公室搞个活动，比比谁最能羞辱她，最先把她气哭的同事获胜？

original: D)...walk up to her and growl, "Why don't you try eating that with no teeth, you fat fuck?"
translated: D)...走到她面前咆哮：「吃东西就吃东西，牙齿他妈别那么大声啊，死肥猪」？
